name: apple_cursor
description: Enjoy upcoming `macOS Big Sur` Cursor Theme ðŸ¥³

scripts.unpack: cd ./packages && mkdir macOSBigSur && tar -xvf macOSBigSur.tar -C macOSBigSur && cd ..
scripts.compile: yarn clean && yarn render && yarn build
scripts.setup: sudo pip3 install virtualenv && virtualenv env && source ./env/bin/activate && pip3 install -r requirements.txt && yarn install

author: Kaiz Khatri
